snippet: Donald J. Trump brought his roadshow to the American Airlines Center, delivering a searing indictment of Washington politics, his Republican rivals and others to thousands of supporters.
abstract: Republican presidential candidate Donald J Trump, keeping with his message, speaks to big crowd of supporters at American Airlines Center in Dallas.
lead_paragraph: Donald J. Trump brought his roadshow to the American Airlines Center, delivering a searing indictment of Washington politics, his Republican rivals and others to thousands of supporters.

headline.main: Cheers, Puns and Protest Welcome Donald Trump in Dallas
headline.print_headline: Greeted by Cheers, Puns and Protest, Trump Stays on the Attack in Dallas
